about_the_game:
The world as we know has come to end, there was an outbreak and now there are only a few survivors left, we must fight to our last breath to keep our friends alive, we are surrounded by many walkers and many other creatures that we have not seen before if your reading this letter then run hide and fight and maybe, just maybe you will survive.

Over-Run was designed and created by 1 developer and my sole mission is to design and build my ultimate game.

with Over-Run I have reinvented the wheel in a figure of speech, I have taken one of my favorite games and remade it in a way I feel is more current and more customizable for the players.

Over-Run will be moving into early access very soon.

Over-Run is a Wave base zombie game with bosses, hidden puzzle (Easter egg) perks, and much much more to come

with over 10 different weapons to start with (more will be added )
6 different perks which are upgradeable
2 different Easter eggs on different maps
2 different maps on early access
and much much more

Please join Twitter and Instagram discord for updates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-1215UE Processor (10M Cache, up to 4.40 GHz)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 730 3GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-1215UE Processor (10M Cache, up to 4.40 GHz)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 730 3GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: A modern twist of a Zombie Round Base Multiplayer Game, can you survive
